definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
no end of virtuous achievements (idiom); boundless beneficence
virtuous achievements come to their successful conclusion (idiom)

sentences.english: Shariputra, the Land of Utmost Happiness is crowned in merits, virtues and splendors such as these.
sentences.chinese: 舍利弗，极乐国土，成就如是功德庄严。

sentences.english: The merits, virtues and adornments such as these are inconceivable.
sentences.chinese: 如是功德庄严，不可思议。

sentences.english: He is remembered for his charity work as well as his hotel business.
sentences.chinese: 他的慈善功德像他的酒店事业一样使他为人们所怀念。

sentences.english: Disciple wishes to dedicate all merits to all sentient beings.
sentences.chinese: 弟子愿回向所有功德给所有众生。

sentences.english: The sutra also lists 250 examples to describe aptly the qualities of bodhichitta.
sentences.chinese: 并以250种比喻恰如其分地描述了菩提心的功德。

sentences.english: By just picking up litter and refraining from littering we are doing meritorious deeds.
sentences.chinese: 能不乱丢垃圾，随时清捡垃圾，都是做的功德。

sentences.english: All merits and virtues originate from realizing the Dharma, from which Nirvana dwells.
sentences.chinese: 一切功德皆源自见法，这亦是寂灭之所在。

sentences.english: I must have accumulated some merit during my past lives.
sentences.chinese: 过去生里，我定曾积聚功德。

sentences.english: The one who practices while turning equals the fortune of the thousand buddhas.
sentences.chinese: 边修边转嘛尼轮的功德与供养千佛的功德相等。

sentences.english: The one who practices while turning equals the fortune of the thousand buddhas.
sentences.chinese: 边修边转嘛尼轮的功德与供养千佛的功德相等。

sentences.english: And it is primarily because of this merit that Devadatta will also become a Buddha in the future.
sentences.chinese: 提婆达多因为这样的功德，将来也会成佛的。

sentences.english: With each passing day, you will possess the merits of the six paramitas.
sentences.chinese: 是人日日得具六波罗蜜圆满功德。

sentences.english: Through the power of the merit here produced by my reverence for the Buddha, may all my obstructions cease to be.
sentences.chinese: 以我在此礼敬佛陀的功德之力，愿我的一切障碍止息。

sentences.english: Born of the true Dhamma, endowed with such virtues as good practice.
sentences.chinese: 由真法而生，有这般善行修持的功德。

sentences.english: Through the practice of the quality of loving kindness and non-violence we can help others.
sentences.chinese: 同过修持仁爱与非暴力的功德，我们可以帮助别人。

sentences.english: All those Buddhas equally praise my inconceivable merit and virtue saying these words.
sentences.chinese: 彼诸佛等，亦称赞我不可思议功德，而作是言。

definition: karmic hindrance (buddhism)/karmic consequences that stand in the way of enlightenment/(term of abuse, especially toward the younger generation) devil spawn/(fig.) money
no end of virtuous achievements (idiom); boundless beneficence
to do good works/to be merciful
to be reborn/to live in paradise (Buddhism)/to die/(after) one's death
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva, the Bodhisattva of the Great Vow (to save all souls before accepting Bodhi)/also translated Earth Treasury, Earth Womb, or Earth Store Bodhisattva
(Buddhism) to deliver all living creatures from suffering (idiom)
